7857.quoteText: You may not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorised purpose.
7857.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

7861.quoteText:
The information we collect from you may be used in any of the following ways :
  1. To perform technical checks;
  2. To fulfill legal requests;
  3. To deliver customer service
  4. To process payment transactions.
7861.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

7862.quoteText:
• Do we use cookies ?
    Yes. Our cookies are "authentication cookies" and not "tracking cookies": we do not track you after your session on our servers.
7862.title: This service only uses temporary session cookies

tosdr.case: This service only uses temporary session cookies

7864.quoteText:
We retain backups of deleted messages and documents for 45 days.
This is for the purpose of restoring data in case of accidental deletion by users.
After 45 days, data will be permanently deleted from all our systems.
7864.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
